mapper.select: SELECT b.bookmark_id, b.member_id, b.board_id, bo.bookmark_count FROM bookmark b INNER JOIN board bo ON b.board_id = bo.board_id WHERE b.bookmark_id = #{bookmarkId}
SELECT b.bookmark_id, b.member_id, b.board_id, bo.bookmark_count FROM bookmark b INNER JOIN board bo ON b.board_id = bo.board_id ORDER BY b.bookmark_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark (bookmark_id, member_id, board_id) VALUES (#{bookmarkId}, #{memberId}, #{boardId})
